Reviews.Title: “Poor standard, not recommended”
Reviews.Author: jdavies2001
Reviews.Content: travelodge pretty run stained dirty curtain fell pole staff friendly hotel simply tired bit grotty cant fault location major revamp premier inn hill miles similar price

Reviews.Title: “Great location, just the job”
Reviews.Author: bikesbmr
Reviews.Content: stayed visiting london hotel location excellent transport centre london 5 minute walk underground station close nice pubs shops restaurants street pub restaurant door nice pub serves breakfast eat clean spacious family booked advance rate £25 normally £75 mark ground floor contrary reviews tube line note baths showers larger normal shower cubicle nice staff encountered friendly willing help pleasent stay

Reviews.Title: “Artwork on walls in a Travelodge?”
Reviews.Author: Rainbows75
Reviews.Content: booked six months advance paid family 2 couple days christmas visiting family surprised clean decorative little travelodge central line passed hotel didnt notice receptionist helpful available time mentioned travelodge signposted able busy road past car park welllit secure leave car overnight book travelodge youd book deal easy walk morning leaving car getting breakfast local cafe surrounding pleasant evening meal hard

Reviews.Title: “Big Disappointment”
Reviews.Author: jillip
Reviews.Content: booked advanced paid night 2 nights arrived stay booked hotel parking close proximity underground london sons wedding intention using car instead stay travelodge underground nearly mile re arrange plans wedding car inconvenience travelodge measly £5000 voucher

Reviews.Title: “one of the best!”
Reviews.Author: sbarrett91
Reviews.Content: read mixed reviews booking didnt expect expected noisy pipes didnt hear peep greeted lovely female receptionist feel welcome unlike liverpool street travelodge clean tidy quiet nights sleep ater watching shrek musical theatre royal worth defintely using travelodge vending machine selling usual shampoos shower gels etc useful

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't return”
Reviews.Author: catrinheledd
Reviews.Content: hotel okay usual travelodge basic stayed 5 nights clean sheets towels day staying towels toilet roll ran week corridor strong smell ground floor coming hotel ideal children reception staff males ones rude unhelpful toby door awful staff miserable told food served breakfast served bag outside 700 school packed lunch style hotel extremely noisy sleep night pipes noisy door shower woken location hand excellent walking distance tesco convenient buy toilet roll boots newsagent lovely chinese restraunt corner tube station 2 minute walk 20 mins oxford street main shops parking drive okay staying night im student fussy expect
